title: [HOLD for payment 2024-01-17] [$500] Distance - Able to request money by distance by adding a stop same as finish point without enterring start point From
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: Action Performed:
1. Open app
2. Click on '+' FAB icon in LHS
3. Click on Request Money
4. Select Distance tab
5. Click on Add stop and fill India
6. Click on Stop and fill India
7. Click on Next button to proceed further
8. Able to Create Request

Expected result: It should not create request with not valid waypoints

Actual result: None

Click on Next button to proceed further 8.
